      • newObstacle

        public Obstacle newObstacle(int i)
        The method creates a new instance of the object and uses the spwnCollistion method to see if it collides with any of the other squares if does the process again and in the end of the recurrence method returns the new instance of the object
        Parameters:
        i - The index value to get the object as well as the thread
        Returns:
        The new instance of obstacle
        See Also:
        Constructor, Collistion check
